content:
Our weekly podcast on the markets, the economy and the world of business

AMERICA’S LARGEST banks reported earnings this week. Bank of America’s chief executive, Brian Moynihan, tells Anne McElvoy why he is bullish about the American economy and justifies his pay package. Also, can Goldman Sachs reinvent itself in the shadow of a scandal? And Tiger Woods’s stroke of genius —for the business of golf. Simon Long hosts.

Listen on: Apple Podcasts | Spotify  | Google  |  Stitcher  |  TuneIn

wp.Gary Goldman: 戈德曼;加里;盖瑞高登曼;加利·高曼
wp.Sean Goldman: 学区助理学监葛德曼;高德曼
wp.Steven Goldman: 史蒂芬·高曼;营律师郭得曼

eg2: Both "sausage" and "meatball" pigment Sacs appear in a sample from the cheek feathers of Anchiornis.
近鸟龙的头部羽毛样本同时出现了“香肠”和“肉球”状的色素囊。
More sounds meant more information could be shared, giving those who lacked air  a better chance of survival in a dangerous world.
声音增多意味着可以分享的信息增多，这使得那些没有气囊的祖先在危险环境里的生存几率大大增加。
COPD inflames the bronchial tubes and the tiny Sacs called alveoli that line the lungs, making them less flexible and elastic.
COPD能使支气管和排满肺部的叫做气泡的小型气囊发炎，从而使他们失去弹性和柔软性。

ex: n. 〔机〕缝针；拼逢机；钉箱机；齿形压滚
网络 带材缝合机；钉书机；订书机

wp.bullish market: 上涨的股市;牛市;利好市场;多头市场

ex: adj. 看涨的；上扬的；似公牛的
n. 管理人员；领导层；（政府的）行政部门
adj. 经营管理的；经理的；决策的；有执行权的
网络 行政官；执行的；行政的
eg2: advertising/business/sales, etc. executives
广告、业务、销售等主管
a chief/senior/top executive in a computer firm
一家计算机公司的总裁╱资深主管╱高层主管
The union's executive has/have yet to reach a decision.
工会领导层尚未作出决策。
She has an executive position in a finance company.
她在一家金融公司担任主管。
executive decisions/duties/jobs/positions
经营管理的决策╱职责╱工作╱职位
the executive dining room
管理人员食堂
executive authority
行政当局
an executive board/body/committee/officer
执行董事会；行政机构；执行委员会；行政长官
Executive power is held by the president.
执行权由董事长掌握。
an executive car/home
高级汽车╱住宅
an executive suite(= in a hotel)
（旅馆的）贵宾套房
an executive lounge(= at an airport)
（机场的）贵宾休息室

ex: vt. 重新使用；彻底改造；重复发明（在不知他人已发明的情况下）
eg2: In short, we need to reinvent the toilet.
简而言之，我们需要彻底改造马桶。
I will try my best to reinvent my own life.
我愿尽力彻底改造自己的生活。
That dream – that American Dream – is what drove the Allen Brothers to  their roofing company for a new era.
这个梦想——美国梦——驱使着艾伦兄弟为了一个新时代而彻底改造了他们的屋顶工程公司。

ex: n. 丑闻；流言蜚语；诽谤；公愤

wp.Untold Scandal: 丑闻;挑情宝鉴;男女相悦之事
wp.Scandal Makers: 非常主播;超速绯闻;极速绯闻
wp.SCANDAL SHOW: 惊选集;初回生产限定盘

eg2: He could not but cough up his political .
他迫不得已只好吐露出他的政治丑闻。
The political scandal tarnished the reputation of the president.
这起政治丑闻败坏了总统的名誉。
This scandal may well bring the president down at the next election.
这件丑闻也许会使总统在下次选举中失败。

ex: n. 中风；笔画；钟声；抚摩
v. 抚摩（动物的毛皮）；轻抚；轻挪；轻触
网络 行程；冲程；描边
eg2: What a beautiful stroke!
击球动作多漂亮呀！
He won by two strokes(= in golf , by taking two fewer strokes than his opponent) .
他以少于对手两杆的成绩获胜。
His punishment was six strokes of the cane.
给他的惩罚是挨六教鞭。
She took a few more strokes to reach the bank.
她又划几下，游到了岸边。
Butterfly is the only stroke I can't do.
只有蝶泳我不会。
He gave the cat a stroke.
他抚摩了一下猫。
to paint with fine brush strokes
一小刷一小刷地刷漆
At the stroke of a pen(= by signing sth) they removed thousands of people from the welfare system.
他们大笔一挥，就把成千上万的人排除在福利制度之外。
Your idea was a stroke of genius .
你的主意很高明。
It was a stroke of luck that I found you here.
我在这儿看见你纯属巧遇。
It was a bold stroke to reveal the identity of the murderer on the first page.
在头版上披露谋杀犯的身份，这是一个大胆的举措。
She never does a stroke (of work)(= never does any work) .
她一向什么活儿都不干。
At the first stroke it will be 9 o'clock exactly.
等到钟敲第一下时就是 9 点整。
on the stroke of three(= at 3 o'clock exactly)
三点整
to have/suffer a stroke
患中风
The stroke left him partly paralysed.
他因中风身体局部瘫痪了。
They threatened to cancel the whole project at a stroke.
他们威胁要一下子砍掉整个项目。
They threatened to cancel the whole project at a stroke.
他们威胁要一下子砍掉整个项目。
He's a beautiful dog. Can I stroke him?
这只狗真漂亮，我可以摸一摸吗？
He stroked her hair affectionately.
他深情地抚摩着她的头发。
She stroked away his tears.
她轻轻拭去他的眼泪。
He stroked the ball between the posts.
他轻轻一触，把球踢进门柱之间。

Title: A big week for American banks

paperStatistics.title: A big week for American banks
paperStatistics.desc: Our weekly podcast on the markets, the economy and the world of business
